description: A Marine base located in the New World, known for its rough and unconventional Marines. Led by Vice Admiral Smoker after his promotion and transfer.

keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines Decimated by Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Most G-5 Marines are knocked unconscious by Doflamingo's Conqueror's Haki, and the survivors are controlled by his Parasite technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power difference between a Warlord and regular Marines, even in the New World.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Protects His Men
keyMoments.description: Smoker uses his body as a shield to protect his G-5 subordinates from Doflamingo's attack.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the bond between Smoker and his unorthodox Marines.

description: An alliance formed between the Straw Hat Pirates and the Heart Pirates to take down Yonko Kaidou by destroying his SMILE supply through Doflamingo.

leaders.role: Co-Leader / Captain of Straw Hat Pirates

keyMoments.title: Alliance Plan Revealed to Crew
keyMoments.description: Luffy explains the alliance's ultimate goal to take down Kaidou to the Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.significance: The full crew learns about the ambitious plan to challenge one of the Four Emperors.
